name: Fortress Church
welcomeMessage: Welcome to Fortress Church! We're a community of believers dedicated to growing in faith, serving our neighbors, and sharing God's love. Whether you're new to faith or have been walking with Christ for years, there's a place for you here.
mission: To be a beacon of hope and faith in our community, providing a place where all can gather to worship, grow, and serve together.

buildingProject.name: New Sanctuary Building
buildingProject.description: We are building a new sanctuary to accommodate our growing congregation and better serve our community. This project represents our commitment to faith, fellowship, and future generations.
